mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stdt (stdt_id, stdt_email, stdt_pwd, stdt_nm, gender_cd, birth_dd, stdt_tel, job_cd, role_cd, stdt_cd, rgst_dt, rgster_id, updt_dt, updter_id) VALUES (#{stdtId}, #{stdtEmail}, #{stdtPwd}, #{stdtNm}, #{genderCd}, #{birthDd}, #{stdtTel}, #{jobCd}, #{roleCd}, #{stdtCd}, #{rgstDt}, #{rgsterId}, #{updtDt}, #{updterId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM stdt WHERE stdt_id=#{stdtId} AND stdt_pwd=#{stdtPwd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT post_id as "postId", post_title as "postTitle", post_cd as "postCd", rgst_dt as "rgstDd" FROM post WHERE post_id LIKE 'NTC%' and post_cd= (select tpcd_id||cmcd_id from cmcd where cmcd_nm='공개') ORDER BY rgst_dt DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT post_id as "postId", post_title as "postTitle", post_hit as "postHit", post_cd as "postCd", rgst_dt as "rgstDd" FROM post WHERE post_id LIKE 'NTC%' and post_cd= (select tpcd_id||cmcd_id from cmcd where cmcd_nm='공개') ORDER BY rgst_dt DESC

SELECT post_id as "postId", post_title as "postTitle", post_hit as "postHit", post_cd as "postCd", rgster_id as "rgsterId", rgst_dt as "rgstDd" FROM post WHERE post_id LIKE 'INQ%' ORDER BY rgst_dt DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT clss_id as "clssId", clss_nm as "clssNm", aply_start_dt as "aplyStartDd", aply_end_dt as "aplyEndDd", clss_cd as "clssCd" FROM clss WHERE clss_cd= (select tpcd_id||cmcd_id from cmcd where cmcd_nm='접수중') ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 15

SELECT clss_id as "clssId", clss_nm as "clssNm", aply_start_dt as "aplyStartDd", aply_end_dt as "aplyEndDd", clss_start_dd AS "clssStartDd", clss_end_dd AS "clssEndDd", substr(clss_adr, 1, 3) AS "clssAdr", cmcd.cmcd_nm AS "clssCd", flup.file_nm as "cmpyId" FROM clss JOIN cmcd on cmcd.tpcd_id||cmcd.cmcd_id = clss.clss_cd JOIN flup on flup.post_id = clss.cmpy_id ORDER BY clss_id

SELECT clss_id as "clssId", clss_nm as "clssNm", aply_start_dt as "aplyStartDd", aply_end_dt as "aplyEndDd", clss_start_dd as "clssStartDd", clss_end_dd as "clssEndDd", clss_adr as "clssAdr", limit_cnt as "limitCnt", set_in_tm as "setInTm", set_out_tm as "setOutTm", cmcd.cmcd_nm as "clssCd", cmpy_id as "cmpyId" FROM clss JOIN (cmcd on cmcd.tpcd_id||cmcd.cmcd_id = clss.clss_cd) WHERE clss_id=#{classId}
select count(clss_id) as "cmptClassCnt" from rgst where stdt_id= ( SELECT stdt_id FROM stdt WHERE stdt_email=#{stdtEmail} ) and cmpt_CD= (select tpcd_id||cmcd_id from cmcd where cmcd_nm='이수완료')
select count(clss_id) as "aplyClassCnt" from aply where stdt_id= ( SELECT stdt_id FROM stdt WHERE stdt_email=#{stdtEmail} )
